title: New Lee SIn Skin AKA ONE PUNCH MAN
body: Whether you have seen the anime one punch man or not surely you have seen memes of it lee of course is a fist fighter like him although lee is blind and saitama is not it would still be funny to have a one punch man skin

replies.body: WTF why does this have so many downvotes? Great idea man, dunno why community be hatin' on this today. As a guy who owns all the Lee Sin skins, I would love a One Punch Man in my collection :D

Sorry for the late reply i was overseas for sometime and i merely suggested it for fun OPM MC Saitama is simply dense as hell although lee sin doesn't match that completely i think it's just be fun to watch and see what they could do with it of course i understand all the legal issues with copyright although it's not as if its stopped riot before

i feel like if they started the anime based skin designs its just gonna go downhill and league will be officially infested with nothing but bronies and weeaboos. if they were to start anime based skins why would they start with that though? theres like a 1000 other concepts that would be way more popular. dbz pokemon naruto one piece. everyone would prefer skins from these franchises over another bald lee sin skin

I understand your point and i can much agree but the point is matching skin to character so you can match wukong-goku maybe just maybe zac-luffy but honestly i only suggested this in the spur of the moment with a friend, you can take it as a joke or think something of it it'd just be funny that's all no need to get so offended
